title: Remove logo from navigation

requirements.text: Remove the logo design (Om symbol or any custom logo image/graphic) from the Navigation component. Replace it with plain text branding or remove it entirely, leaving no logo asset rendered in the nav bar.
acceptanceCriteria: No logo image or custom graphic is rendered in the Navigation component.
The navigation bar remains functional with Feed and Profile links intact.
No broken image references or missing asset errors appear in the console.

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Changing navigation links or their behavior.
Modifying the footer or other components.
